item.title: The One With My Fear Of Coding
item.description: No it wasn’t my idea to write this. The next two paragraphs weren’t even written for this. I was writing the about section for this website of mine. Halfway through, I realised that if I continue writing this, my about page will turn into a 500 line “Chirag’s childhood” real quick. So rather a post. My earliest engagement with programming was in class 7 because of BASIC. Ngl, I hated it.

item.description:
